text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Hortolândia | settlement_type = Municipality | image_skyline = | image_caption = | image_flag = Bandeira Hortolandia SaoPaulo Brasil.svg | image_shield = Brasao_Hortolandia_SaoPaulo_Brasil_v2.svg | image_map = SaoPaulo Municip Hortolandia.svg | map_caption = Location in São Paulo state | pushpin_map = Brazil | pushpin_map_caption = Location in Brazil | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Region | subdivision_name1 = Southeast Brazil | subdivision_type2 = State | subdivision_name2 = São Paulo | subdivision_type3 = Metropolitan Region | subdivision_name3 = Campinas | leader_party = | leader_title = Prefect | leader_name = | area_total_km2 = 62.42 | elevation_m = 587 | population_total = 234,259 | population_as_of = 2020 IBGE 2020 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = BRT | utc_offset1 = -3 | timezone1_DST = BRST | utc_offset1_DST = -2 | postal_code_type = Postal code | postal_code = | area_code_type = Phone code | area_code = | website = }} Hortolândia is a municipality in the state of São Paulo in Brazil. It is part of the Metropolitan Region of Campinas. 234,259 people lived here in 2020. ==References== Category:Municipalities in São Paulo (state)
